_header: The hare went the market scarlet for to sell

BodRawD328.Transcription:
The hare wente þe markyth scharlyt forto syllThe grehoun stode
                    hym be fore mony for to tell
BodRawD328.Note:
Translating, ‘Forum lepus petabat…’ (2 lines),
                    which follows it
BodRawD328.Editions:
Meech,  Sanford Brown. 
             “A Collection of Proverbs in Rawlinson MS D 328.” 
             Modern Philology
         38 (1940-41): 113-32: 124.
Orme,  Nicholas. 
             “Children and Literature in Medieval England.” 
             Medium Ævum
         68 (1999): 218-46: 221.
